analysis.description:
CommonCrowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#490-494) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(to) == 0

Reentrancy in CommonCrowdsale.finishITO (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#457-475):
	External calls:
	- totalSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#463-464)
	- mint(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#471)
	- mint(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#473-474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isITOFinished (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#474-475)
	- tokenHolders (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#473-474)

Reentrancy in CommonCrowdsale.payExtraTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#437-457):
	External calls:
	- value = token.balanceOf(tokenHolder) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#450)
	- token.mint(this,targetValue) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#452)
	- token.transfer(tokenHolder,targetValue) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#452-454)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- index (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#454)

GOToken.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#289-296) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(owner,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#292-294)

CommonCrowdsale.payExtraTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#437-457) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,targetValue) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#452)
	-token.transfer(tokenHolder,targetValue) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#452-454)

CommonCrowdsale.tokenOperationsFinished (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#475-482) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#481)

CommonCrowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#490-494) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,value) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#493)

CommonCrowdsale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#525-528) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(wallet,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#526-528)

Reentrancy in CommonCrowdsale.calculateAndTransferTokens (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#494-508):
	External calls:
	- mint(to,tokens) (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#503)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#503-507)

Reentrancy in CommonCrowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#490-494):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(to) == 0 (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#493)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenHolders (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#493)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/48/0x05a40435e4e6ecdabd630ba8593d50b6b6ce14f9.sol#1): it allows old versions
